Waiting For Henry is a new band of old friends brought together by the drive to continue creating soundtracks that keeps life humming. The result is the decidedly real rock & roll of Ghosts & Compromise: 11 tracks that echo the undying influence the original indie bands have had on a generations of twangy dreamers. The immediacy of Waiting For Henry's debut was aptly captured by Bob Rice of Crossroad on KYRS (Spokane, WA)... "#&^#%ing Jesus, these guys rock! I love the whole sound... REM meets the Jayhawks."

Led by former Mr. Henry (EMI/Deep South) alt-rocker Dave Slomin on lead vocal & guitar, Waiting For Henry includes Dave Ashdown (Dashdown) on drums, guitar & vocals and veteran NYC bassist, Michael Chun (Hot Lava)..
